snippet: In their accessories and the ceremony itself, Adrienne Baker and Austin Vitt of Chicago advocated same-sex marriage.
abstract: Samuel G Freedman On Religion column on increasing number of heterosexual couples who are using their weddings, from choices of readings to symbolic wristbands, to urge support for gay marriage.
lead_paragraph: In their accessories and the ceremony itself, Adrienne Baker and Austin Vitt of Chicago advocated same-sex marriage.

headline.print_headline: Adding a Ritual to a Wedding: Showing Support for Gay Marriage
headline.seo: Standing Up for Gay Marriage at a Straight Wedding
headline.main: Adding a Ritual to a Wedding: Showing Support for Gay Marriage

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
